text: Fikret Hakan (23 April 1934 – 11 July 2017), also known as Bumin Gaffar Çitanak, was a Turkish movie actor. He was the recipient of the honorary State Artist, a prestigious title awarded by the Turkish government. He was born in Balıkesir, Turkey. He was known for his role as Kara in Revenge of the Snakes (Yılanların öcü) (1962). Hakan died on 11 July 2017 in a hospital in Istanbul, Turkey of lung cancer at the age of 83. ==Filmography== * Yayla Kartalı (1945) * Senede Bir Gün (1946) * Yara (1947) * Damga (1948) * Üvey Baba (1949) * Çakircali Mehmet Efe (1950) * Lale Devri (1951) * Edi Ile Büdü Tiyatrocu (1952) * Hoşgör Boşver Aldırma Memo Festivalde (1953) * Cingöz Recai (1954) * Battal Gazi Geliyor (1955) * Büyük Sır (1956) * Bir Avuç Toprak (1957) * Dokuz Dağın Efesi - ( Çakici Geliyor ) (1958) * Zümrüt (1959) * Taş Bebek (1960) * Yılanların Öcü (1961) * Zorla Evlendik (1962) * Barut Fıçısı (1963) * Keşanlı Ali Destanı (1964) * Turist Ömer (1964) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Turkish movie actors
title: Fikret Hakan
